summary.span: 使用用户定义的模板显示数据源中单个记录的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控件可用于编辑、删除和插入记录。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于显示来自数据源的单个记录。The control is used to display a single record from a data source. 它是类似于控制，只是它显示用户定义的模板，而不是行字段。It is similar to the control, except it displays user-defined templates instead of row fields. 创建你自己的模板为你提供更灵活地控制数据的显示方式。Creating your own templates gives you greater flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 绑定到数据源控件，如和。Binding to data source controls, such as and . - 内置插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 内置更新和删除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 内置分页功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便动态设置属性、 处理事件，依次类推。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 通过用户定义的模板、 主题和样式的自定义外观。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates, themes, and styles. ## 模板Templates 有关控件显示内容，您需要为该控件的不同部分创建模板。For the control to display content, you need to create templates for the different parts of the control. 大多数模板是可选的;但是，你必须创建用于在其中配置该控件的模式的模板。Most templates are optional; however, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如，支持插入记录的控件必须具有定义的插入项模板。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an insert item template defined. 下表列出可以创建不同的模板。The following table lists the different templates that you can create. |模板类型Template type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定义数据的内容时行控件处于编辑模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 此模板通常包含输入的控件和命令按钮与其用户可以编辑现有记录。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can edit an existing record.| ||空数据行显示时定义的内容控件绑定到数据源不包含任何记录。Defines the content for the empty data row displayed when the control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records. 此模板通常包含内容，以提醒用户数据源不包含任何记录。This template usually contains content to alert the user that the data source does not contain any records.| ||定义页脚行的内容。Defines the content for the footer row. 通常，此模板包含你想要的页脚行中显示的任何其他内容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the footer row. **注意：** 作为替代方法，你可以只需指定要通过设置显示在页脚行文本属性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the footer row by setting the property.| ||定义标头行的内容。Defines the content for the header row. 通常，此模板包含你想要显示的标题行中的任何其他内容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the header row. **注意：** 作为替代方法，你可以只需指定要通过设置标题行中显示文本属性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the header row by setting the property.| ||定义数据的内容时行控件是否处于只读模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 此模板通常包含内容，以显示现有记录的值。This template usually contains content to display the values of an existing record.| ||定义数据的内容时行控件是否处于插入模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 此模板通常包含输入的控件和用户可以使用该对话框添加一条新记录的命令按钮。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can add a new record.| ||定义当启用分页功能时，显示的页导航行的内容 (时属性设置为`true`)。Defines the content for the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`). 此模板通常包含与其用户可以导航到另一条记录的控件。This template usually contains controls with which the user can navigate to another record. **注意：** 控件有内置的页导航行用户界面 (UI)。**Note:** The control has a built-in pager row user interface (UI). 你需要创建页导航模板，仅当你想要创建您自己的自定义页导航行。You need to create a pager template only if you want to create your own custom pager row.| 若要显示的字段值中的项模板，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the value of a field in an item template, use a data binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 编辑项模板和插入项模板中的输入的控件可以绑定到数据源的字段中，使用双向绑定表达式。Input controls in the edit item template and insert item template can be bound to the fields of a data source by using a two-way binding expression. 这允许控件可以自动提取更新的输入控件的值或插入操作。This allows the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 双向绑定表达式还允许在编辑项模板以自动显示字段的原始值中的输入的控件。Two-way binding expressions also allow input controls in an edit item template to automatically display the original field values. 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以绑定到数据源控件 (如， ，或) 或任何数据源集合可实现接口，如， ， ，或其他集合类型。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as , , or ) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将绑定控件添加到适当的数据源类型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要将绑定到数据源控件，将设置属性控制转移到数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件，并且可以利用数据源控件的功能，以执行插入、 更新、 删除和分页功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 这是将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 将绑定到数据源实现接口，以编程方式设置属性控件拖到数据源，然后调用方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 使用此方法时控件不提供内置的插入、 更新、 删除和分页功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 你需要通过使用相应的事件来提供此功能。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 只要有可能，强烈建议确保值之前都是 HTML 编码它们会显示在此控件。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## 数据操作Data Operations 控件提供了许多内置功能，允许用户更新、 删除、 插入和分页控件中的项。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 当控件绑定到数据源控件，控件可利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新、 删除、 插入和分页功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以为更新、 删除、 插入和与其他类型的数据源的分页操作提供支持; 但是，必须将相应的事件处理程序提供这些操作的实现。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 因为控件使用模板，它不提供自动生成命令按钮以执行更新、 删除或插入操作的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate command buttons to perform updating, deleting, or inserting operations. 在适当的模板，必须手动将这些命令按钮。You must manually include these command buttons in the appropriate template. 控件可识别具有某些按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为特定值。The control recognizes certain buttons that have their `CommandName` properties set to specific values. 下表列出的命令按钮控件可识别。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"|使用更新或插入操作来取消操作并以放弃用户输入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 随后控制返回到所指定的模式属性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|在删除操作中用于从数据源中删除所显示的记录。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"|在更新操作中用于使控件处于编辑模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 中指定的内容属性显示为数据行。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|"插入""Insert"|用于在插入操作中尝试使用由用户提供的值的数据源中插入新记录。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source using the values provided by the user. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |新建New|"New""New"|在插入操作中用于使控件置于插入模式。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 中指定的内容属性显示为数据行。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |页Page|"页""Page"|在分页操作中用于表示执行分页的页导航行中的按钮。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 若要指定的分页操作，设置`CommandArgument`的按钮为"下一步"、"上一步"、"第一个"、"最后一个"，或要导航到页的索引的属性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引发和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 仅中页导航模板通常使用此类型的按钮。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|"更新""Update"|用于在更新操作中尝试使用由用户提供的值更新数据源中显示的记录。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 与删除按钮 （从而会立即删除显示的记录） 不同，单击编辑或新建按钮时，控件进入编辑模式或分别插入模式。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the displayed record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在编辑模式，内容包含在属性显示为当前数据项。In edit mode, the content contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 通常情况下，编辑项模板被定义以便编辑按钮替换为更新和取消按钮。Typically, the edit item template is defined such that the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 输入适合于该字段的数据类型的控件 (如或控件) 通常还显示与用户若要修改的字段的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are also usually displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 单击更新按钮更新数据源中的记录，而单击取消按钮放弃所有更改。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同样中, 包含的内容当控件处于在插入模式时，将属性显示的数据项。Likewise, the content contained in the property is displayed for the data item when the control is in insert mode. 插入项模板通常定义，这样新建按钮将替换插入和取消按钮，并且用户以输入新的记录的值显示空的输入的控件。The insert item template is typically defined such that the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. 单击插入按钮时单击取消按钮放弃所有更改无法在数据源中插入记录。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 控件提供分页功能，这样用户就可以导航到其他数据源中的记录。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 启用时，在显示页导航行包含的页导航控件的控件。When enabled, a pager row is displayed in the control that contains the page navigation controls. 若要启用分页，设置属性`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 可以通过设置中包含的对象的属性来自定义的页导航行和属性。You can customize the pager row by setting the properties of objects contained in the and the property. 而不是使用内置的页导航行 UI，你可以通过创建自己的 UI属性。Instead of using the built-in pager row UI, you can create your own UI by using the property. ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 你可以自定义的外观通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性的控件。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||时行数据的样式设置控件处于编辑模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in edit mode.| ||中显示的空数据行的样式设置控制当数据源不包含任何记录。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||页脚行的样式设置控件。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| ||标题行的样式设置控件。The style settings for the header row of the control.| ||时行数据的样式设置控件是否处于插入模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in insert mode.| ||中显示的页导航行的样式设置控制当启用分页功能。The style settings for the pager row displayed in the control when the paging feature is enabled.| ||时行数据的样式设置控件是否处于只读模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.| ## 事件Events 控件提供可以编程的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这允许你每次事件发生时运行的自定义的例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持控件。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击 控件中的某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button within a control is clicked. 此事件通常用于在控件中单击一个按钮时执行的任务。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在所有发生创建对象的控件。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用于显示之前修改的记录的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||时发生的删除按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 单击后，之后控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||单击删除按钮，但之前时发生控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||时发生的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Insert") 单击后，之后控件插入记录。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||单击插入按钮，但之前时发生控件插入记录。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||时发生的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 单击后，之后控件更新行。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||单击更新按钮，但之前时发生控件更新记录。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之后，将会控件更改模式 （到编辑、 插入或只读模式下）。Occurs after the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于执行某项任务时控件更改模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||之前发生控件更改模式 （到编辑、 插入或只读模式下）。Occurs before the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当你需要在用户定位到另一条记录控件中之后执行的任务时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消的分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控制可用于在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果你使用模板的外观进行自定义控件，你可以在模板中标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 你可以防止通过设置呈现表属性`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件来显示中的值控件。The following example demonstrates how to use a control to display the values from a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件有内置的分页功能，允许用户导航到数据源中另一条记录。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 可与任何支持的数据源对象使用分页功能接口或支持分页功能的数据源。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要启用分页功能，请设置属性`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 你可以使用来确定在基础数据源中的项的总数目属性。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要确定当前显示的项的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 启用分页后，调用的页导航行的其他行自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含的页导航控件，并且可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 页导航行均有四个内置的页导航显示模式。The pager row has four built-in pager display modes. 下表描述了四个模式。The following table describes the four modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一组分页控件包含以前和下一步按钮。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|一组的分页控件组成以前，接下来，第一个和最后一个按钮。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一组由用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 这是默认模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一组编号和第一个和最后一个链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| > [!NOTE] > 时数据源包含少于两条记录后，控件将自动隐藏的页导航行。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 你可以通过使用来控制的设置 （如页导航显示模式，在时间和页导航控件的文本标签显示的页链接数） 的页导航行属性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制 （包括其背景色和字体颜色） 的页导航行的外观，使用属性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color and font color), use the property. 控件还允许你定义的页导航行的自定义模板。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 有关创建自定义页导航行模板的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控件提供可用于在发生分页时执行自定义操作的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当你需要在用户定位到另一条记录控件中之后执行的任务时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消的分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| > [!NOTE] > 当您更改时，不会引发这些事件属性以编程方式。These events are not raised when you change the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来启用中的分页功能控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging feature in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页后 (时属性设置为`true`)，一个称为的页导航行附加行会自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含允许用户导航到其他记录，并且可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问对象，表示中的底部页导航行控件。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性是之后才可用控件创建中的底部页导航行事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作底部页导航行，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对任何修改属性必须执行后表示底部页导航行的对象已创建; 否则为控件将覆盖任何更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the object that represents the bottom pager row has been created; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问的底部显示的页导航行控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the bottom of a control. 包括其他内容，然后将更新的页导航行。The pager row is then updated with additional content. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 同一列中的所有单元格控件具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量应用于宽的单元格和列中的所有其他单元格调整为该单元格宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格具有高度相同。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量应用于行中最高的单元格和行中的所有其他单元格调整为该单元格高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要调整单元格之间的间距，使用属性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置此属性，使用的浏览器的默认值。When this property is not set, the default value of the browser is used. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距大小。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否控件处于编辑、 插入或只读模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式，这样用户就可以更新的记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控件是在插入模式下，这样用户就可以将一条新记录添加到数据源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormView.ReadOnly`|控件是否处于只读模式，这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 通常会自动设置此值控制时单击新建、 更新、 插入、 删除或取消命令按钮。This value is normally set automatically by the control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 当控件更改的操作的响应中的模式，则下表中的事件引发。When the control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序在事件发生时执行的适当的例程。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时控件更改模式，但在模式更改之后。Occurs when the control changes modes, but after the mode changes. 此事件通常用于执行任务，每当控件更改模式。This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the control changes modes.| ||发生时控件更改模式，但之前的模式下更改。Occurs when the control changes modes, but before the mode changes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.| **请注意**你更改模式时以编程方式使用，不会引发这些事件方法。**Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否控件处于编辑、 插入或只读模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果用户尝试导航到另一个记录段控件处于编辑的详细信息，将取消该分页操作。If the user attempts to navigate to another record while the control is in edit more, the paging operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewCurrentMode/CS/formviewcurrentmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewCurrentMode/VB/formviewcurrentmodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否控件返回到编辑、 插入或只读模式更新后，执行插入、 或取消操作。Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an update, insert, or cancel operation is performed. 默认情况下，控件返回到只读模式; 但是，你可以保留在编辑中的控制，或者通过将此属性设置为适当的值插入模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式，这样用户就可以更新的记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控件是在插入模式下，这样用户就可以将一条新记录添加到数据源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|控件是否处于只读模式，这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 此属性通常是时使用控件具有单一用途，如仅要插入或编辑记录。This property is commonly used when the control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以保留控件处于编辑模式后更新操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现控件的当前模式所基于的数据行的不同模板 (指定的属性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表显示每种模式使用哪个模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈现的模板Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |只读Read-only|| 使用属性来定义你自己的用户界面 (UI) 的数据行时控件处于编辑模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 编辑项模板通常包含要更新现有记录，以及更新的记录，并用于取消更新操作的命令按钮的值的用户的输入的控件。The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要指定自定义模板、 首先``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 通过使用双向绑定表达式，可以将字段与输入控件相关联。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 这允许控件可以自动在处于编辑模式关联的输入控件中显示原始的字段值。This allows the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode. 当更新某个记录时，控件从关联的输入控件中自动提取更新的字段值。When a record is updated, the control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control. 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要创建执行内置的取消和更新操作的命令按钮，请将命令按钮控件添加到模板的模板其`CommandName`下表中列出的属性设置为值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"| |更新Update|"更新""Update"| 你可以通过使用来控制的项模板的外观属性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在编辑模式中定义数据行的自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in edit mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制数据的外观时行控件处于编辑模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in edit mode. 当控件处于编辑模式时，数据行显示由指定的用户定义的内容属性。When the control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 将属性置于开始标记中窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 嵌套``元素开始标记和结束标记之间控件。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定数据的自定义样式时行控件处于编辑模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in edit mode. insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要指定自定义模板、 首先``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 通过使用双向绑定表达式，可以将字段与输入控件相关联。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 当插入一条记录时，控件自动从关联的输入控件中提取的字段值。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要创建用于执行内置的取消和插入操作的命令按钮，请将命令按钮控件添加到模板的模板其`CommandName`下表中列出的属性设置为值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"| |InsertInsert|"插入""Insert"| 你可以通过使用来控制的项模板的外观属性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在插入模式中定义数据行的自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in insert mode. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的某个按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button within a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的按钮时引发事件控件被单击。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 中的按钮控件也可以调用某些控件的内置功能。Buttons within a control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control. 若要执行这些操作之一，设置`CommandName`为下表中的值之一的按钮的属性。To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"取消""Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作，并返回控件添加到所指定的模式属性。Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |“Delete”"Delete"|删除当前记录。Deletes the current record. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"编辑""Edit"|放入控件处于编辑模式。Puts the control in edit mode. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"插入""Insert"|将当前记录插入到数据源中。Inserts the current record in the data source. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"New""New"|放入控件置于插入模式。Puts the control in insert mode. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"页""Page"|执行分页操作。Performs a paging operation. 设置`CommandArgument`的按钮为"First"，"最后"、"下一步"、"上一步"或执行页编号，以指定的分页操作类型的属性。Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"更新""Update"|更新数据源中的当前记录。Updates the current record in the data source. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 尽管单击上表中列出的按钮时将引发事件，则我们建议你使用该操作的表中列出的事件。Although the event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定命令名称和被单击按钮的命令参数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. 若要确定的命令名称和命令参数，请使用和属性，分别。To determine the command name and command argument, use the and properties, respectively. 你也可以访问通过引发事件的控件属性。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要处理中的按钮单击事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to handle a button click in a control. 当用户单击添加按钮时，将当前所显示的项添加到控件。When the user clicks the Add button, the currently displayed item is added to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/CS/formviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/VB/formviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs after all the rows are created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中创建的所有行之后，将引发事件控件。The event is raised after all rows are created in a control. 首次呈现控件，或者当用户导航到另一条记录，就可能出现此问题。This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record. 此事件可用于提供执行自定义的例程，例如正在添加或修改行的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。You can use this event to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding to or modifying the contents of a row, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 事件之前发生控件绑定到数据。The event occurs before the control is bound to data. 若要修改的字段绑定的值，使用事件。To modify the value of a bound field, use the event. 你可以访问中的页眉、 页脚和页导航行控件通过使用， ， ，或属性，分别。You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the control by using the , , , or properties, respectively. 若要访问的数据行，使用属性。To access the data row, use the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件更新的文本页导航行中包含的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to update the text of a control contained in the pager row. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的“删除”按钮时，但在删除操作之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but after the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件的删除按钮时 (带按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 在控件内单击时，但之后控件中删除记录。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定删除操作所影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果你想要访问的键字段和非键字段的已删除的记录的名称/值对，使用和属性，分别。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件，以确定是否在删除操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件的删除按钮时 (带按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 在控件内单击时，之前控件中删除记录。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 这样，你可以提供执行自定义的例程，如在每次此事件发生时删除它之前, 验证记录一个事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，以便您可以确定要删除的记录的索引，还可以指示是否应取消删除操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要确定记录的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消删除操作，请设置属性`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 你还可以通过使用访问键字段和非键字段和属性，分别。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件取消删除操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a delete operation. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受 insert 操作的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果你需要访问插入的记录的值，请使用属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式后插入操作的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要保留控件在插入模式下，设置属性`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件，以确定是否在插入操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but before the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Insert") 在控件内单击时，之前控件插入记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码的记录的值在每次此事件发生时数据源中插入之前的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定发送到的可选命令参数的值控件，还可以指示应取消插入操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 命令参数值对应于`CommandArgument`属性的插入按钮。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button. 当`CommandArgument`设置属性的插入按钮，则使用属性来确定命令自变量的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消插入操作，请设置属性`true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您还可以读取或修改新的记录的字段值使用属性。You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件取消插入操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an insert operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现控件的当前模式所基于的数据行的不同模板 (指定的属性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表显示每种模式使用哪个模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈现的模板Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |只读Read-only|| 使用属性来定义你自己的用户界面 (UI) 的数据行时控件是否处于只读模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 项模板通常包含控件显示的字段值的记录，以及命令按钮可以编辑、 插入和删除记录。The item template usually contains controls to display the field values of a record, as well as command buttons to edit, insert, and delete a record. 若要指定自定义模板、 首先``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要显示的字段值的数据源绑定到控件，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 若要创建执行内置删除、 编辑和新的记录操作的命令按钮，请将命令按钮控件添加到模板的模板其`CommandName`下表中列出的属性设置为值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in delete, edit, and new record operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"| |新建New|"New""New"| 你可以通过使用来控制的项模板的外观属性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在只读模式中定义数据行的自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in read-only mode. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的“更新”按钮时，但在更新操作之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an Update button within a control is clicked, but after the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之后控件更新记录。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查更新操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定更新操作所影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果你需要访问已更新记录的键字段值，请使用属性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以使用访问原始和更新的非键字段值和属性，分别。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式后更新操作的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要保留控件处于编辑模式，设置属性`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件，以确定是否在更新操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之前控件更新记录。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码的记录的值在更新该数据源中，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定发送到的可选命令参数的值控件，还可以指示应取消更新操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 命令参数值对应于`CommandArgument`属性的更新按钮。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button. 当`CommandArgument`设置属性的更新按钮，则使用属性来确定命令自变量的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消更新操作，请设置属性`true`。To cancel the update operation, set the property to `true`. 您还可以读取或修改通过使用由用户输入的新值和属性。You can also read or modify the new values entered by the user by using the and properties. 属性包含的键字段，而属性包含非键字段。The property contains the key fields, while the property contains the non-key fields. 如果你需要访问非键字段的原始值，请使用属性。If you need to access the original non-key field values, use the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件取消更新操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an update operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件尝试进行切换之间编辑、 insert 和只读模式，但在实际更改模式。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode actually changes. 此选项，可以提供一个事件处理方法，执行自定义的例程，如同步与另一个控件，每次此事件发生时的控件。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the control with another control, whenever this event occurs. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件的标题行中显示的当前模式控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the current mode in the header row of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件尝试进行切换之间编辑、 insert 和只读模式，但在实际更改模式之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 此选项，可以提供一个事件处理方法，执行自定义的例程，例如配置控制为特定模式或取消模式更改中，每次此事件发生时。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定向其模式控件要切换，以确定是否事件被引发因为用户取消编辑操作，或可以指示应取消插入操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is switching, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled. 若要确定新的模式，请使用属性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 你还可以使用属性通过将其设置为其中一个切换到备用模式枚举值。You can also use the property to switch to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用属性来确定用户是否取消编辑操作。Use the property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation. 若要取消的插入操作，将设置属性`true`。To cancel an insert operation, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件以隐藏页导航行时控件转换到编辑模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用方法来根据需要处理控件层次结构中向上传递的事件方法。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events passed up through the control hierarchy by the method. 它确定是否通过检查的属性处理的事件对象中包含`e`参数。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object contained in the `e` parameter. 当需要处理的事件时，该方法将执行相应的措施。When an event needs to be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 其他事件是忽略，并且控制层次结构中向上传递。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 此方法指示是否将事件进一步通过其返回值控件层次结构中向上传递。This method indicates whether to pass the event further up the control hierarchy through its return value. 控件重写此方法以执行相应的措施，单击某一控件可识别的按钮时的基实现。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出的命令按钮控件可识别。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"|使用更新或插入操作来取消操作并以放弃用户输入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 随后控制返回到所指定的模式属性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|在删除操作中用于从数据源中删除所显示的记录。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"|在更新操作中用于使控件处于编辑模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 中指定的内容属性显示为数据行。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|"插入""Insert"|用于在插入操作中尝试使用由用户提供的值在数据源中插入新记录。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |新建New|"New""New"|在插入操作中用于使控件置于插入模式。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 中指定的内容属性显示为数据行。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |页Page|"页""Page"|在分页操作中用于表示执行分页的页导航行中的按钮。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 若要指定的分页操作，设置`CommandArgument`的按钮为"下一步"、"上一步"、"第一个"、"最后一个"，或要导航到页的索引的属性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引发和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 仅中页导航模板通常使用此类型的按钮。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|"更新""Update"|用于在更新操作中尝试使用由用户提供的值更新数据源中显示的记录。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 此版本的方法返回`true`时处理这些按钮之一。This version of the method returns `true` when one of these buttons is handled. 有关事件上传方法的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取显示数据源中的所有记录所需要的总页数。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.

value.span: 基础数据源中的项数。

span.span: The number of items in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当启用分页功能 (时属性设置为`true`)，使用属性来确定的基础数据源中的记录总数。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source. > [!NOTE] > 因为控件显示一次只有一条记录时，此值对应于数据源中显示的每个记录所需的页的总数。Because the control displays only one record at a time, this value corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source. 数据绑定发生后，此值不准确之前。This value is not accurate until after data-binding occurs. 若要确定当前记录从基础数据源的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定在控件中显示的记录的总数。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the total number of records displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的页导航按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Page") 在控件内单击时，但之后控件处理的分页操作。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置时，将不会引发此事件属性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于的页导航行控件。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用于同步控件替换为控件或设置的行为分页操作完成后的控件。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件，将返回到只读模式下，当用户导航到另一条记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的页导航按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Page") 在控件内单击时，之前控件处理的分页操作。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，每次此事件发生时取消的分页操作，如事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置时，将不会引发此事件属性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于的页导航行控件。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. A对象传递给事件处理方法，以便您可以确定用户选择的页的索引，还可以指示是否应取消的分页操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要确定用户选择的页的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消的分页操作，属性对象传递给`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件取消分页操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的设置中的页导航行控件。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 启用分页功能时，将显示的页导航行 (时属性设置为`true`)，并包含允许用户导航到控件中的不同记录的控件。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `PagerSettings-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerSettings.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSettings.Mode`). 常用设置通常包括的页导航行显示模式和自定义文本或导航控件的图像。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的页导航行的属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的页导航行的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the pager row in a control. 启用分页功能时，将显示的页导航行 (时属性设置为`true`)，并包含允许用户导航到不同的页面控件中的控件。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 将属性置于开始标记中窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `PagerStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`). - 嵌套``元素开始标记和结束标记之间控件。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的页导航行的样式设置。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the style settings for the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 页导航行显示在控制当启用分页功能 (时属性设置为 true)。A pager row is displayed in a control when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to true). 页导航行包含允许用户导航到不同的页面控件中的控件。The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 而不是使用内置的页导航行用户界面 (UI)，你可以定义自己的 UI，通过使用属性。Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置它重写内置页导航行 UI。When the property is set it overrides the built-in pager row UI. 若要指定自定义模板的页导航行，第一次将``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容``标记。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制的页导航行的外观，使用属性。To control the appearance of the pager row, use the property. 通常情况下，将按钮控件添加到页导航模板来执行分页操作。Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations. 控件将执行的分页操作使用的按钮控件时其`CommandName`单击属性设置为"Page"。The control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked. 按钮的`CommandArgument`属性确定要执行的分页操作的类型。The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出了支持的命令参数值控件。The following table lists the command argument values supported by the control. |CommandArgument 值CommandArgument value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |"下一步""Next"|导航至下一页。Navigates to the next page.| |"上一步""Prev"|导航到以前的页面。Navigates to the previous page.| |"First""First"|导航至第一页。Navigates to the first page.| |"最后一个""Last"|导航至最后一页。Navigates to the last page.| |整数值Integer value|导航到指定的页码。Navigates to the specified page number.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义页导航模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom pager template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制数据的外观时行控件是否处于只读 （显示） 模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in read-only (display) mode. 当控件是否处于只读模式时，数据行显示由指定的用户定义的内容属性。When the control is in read-only mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 将属性置于开始标记中窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`). - 嵌套``元素开始标记和结束标记之间控件。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定数据的自定义样式时行控件是否处于只读模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in read-only mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页后 (时属性设置为`true`)，一个称为的页导航行附加行会自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含允许用户导航到其他记录，并且可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问对象，表示中的顶部页导航行控件。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性是之后才可用控件创建中的顶部页导航行事件。The property is available only after the control creates the top pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作顶部页导航行，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对任何修改属性必须执行后控件已经被绑定到数据; 否则为控件将覆盖任何更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been bound to data; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问在顶部显示的页导航行控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the top of a control. 包括其他内容，然后将更新的页导航行。The pager row is then updated with additional content.
